name: Cat Clinic
description:
This is a serious game prototype that tries to help procrastinators reduce academic procrastination. Players will play the role of a pet doctor, completing a mission or getting a cat and taking care of him.  lt's in the experimental step so far. If you have interests in attend this experiment, don't hesitate to contact us! 

Contact email: 1208897008wsy@gmail.com

Artist&Designer: Siyuan Wang

Programmer: Jiaqu Wu
